name: Pineapple Shot - Endless Flicky Challenge
description:
You've been missing something your whole life but you never realized what it was! The urge to throw pens at fruits!

Download now and let's play!

[How to Play]
•Tap the screen to shoot the pen
•Hit the fruits with the pen
•The center number reflects how many pens you need to hit to complete the level!
•Don't hit the other pens or you lose!

[Features]
•Slick and easy to learn one tap gameplay
•Addictive and challenging gameplay suited for all ages!
•Great casual game for any occasion!

Follow us for updates and new games!
